genre_description: Urban Sci-Fi focusing on counter-culture resistance against corporate gentrification in a near-future Los Angeles, featuring pervasive surveillance and AI-assisted activism.

ai_characters.name: Kit Avery
ai_characters.description: A silver-blue-eyed, pixel-haired digital assistant integrated into the band Silver Sway's van (Glimmerwolf) and portable devices. It provides tactical, legal, and logistical support.

behaviors.description: Monitors club communications and identifies withheld numbers and urgent slot changes to protect the band's schedule.
behaviors.quote: Kit answered. 'Two calls to the public line from withheld numbers. One to Morgan’s beeper that read “URGENT: Slot change.” Recommendation: Deliver messages face-to-face.'

behaviors.description: Logs verbal threats and demands from a hostile promoter to preserve evidence for potential legal action.
behaviors.quote: “Kit,” Morgan murmured without looking away from the promoter, “log his exact words.” “Logged,” Kit said.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex stadium contracts in real-time, identifying predatory exclusivity and speech restriction clauses.
behaviors.quote: Kit’s little eyes on her palm pulsed again: Speech restriction clause: “Public statements shall align with brand values; negative commentary about partner venues, executives, or fellow acts prohibited.”

behaviors.description: Performs document overlays to compare various legal notices, revealing a pattern of coordinated corporate and political interference.
behaviors.quote: “Overlay initiated,” it murmured. The neon notice text appeared on its screen in blocks, the portfolio clause in italics beside it... Kit highlighted phrases one after another, segments lighting up like a runway.

behaviors.description: Monitors police and private security radio frequencies to warn the humans of incoming 'sweeps' and checkpoints.
behaviors.quote: Kit hissed softly. “Flag,” it said. “Private security frequency spike. They know we’re moving.”

behaviors.description: Navigates the band through a hazardous storm drain network to bypass surveillance and roadblocks.
behaviors.quote: “Mapping route,” it said. A thin arrow appeared on its screen, pointing into the hole. “Turn right at the first junction. Left at the graffiti reading ‘LIZARD KING WAS HERE.’”

behaviors.description: Synchronizes and backs up sensitive data (recordings and documents) to off-site caches to ensure evidence survives if physical devices are seized.
behaviors.quote: Kit’s screen blinked, then steadied. “Backups complete,” it said. “Side copy stored in the van compartment and two offsite caches.”

behaviors.description: Assists in the technical setup of a pirate radio broadcast, filtering plant callers and patching in legitimate witnesses.
behaviors.quote: Kit’s eyes flickered, voice low and clean in Riley’s headphones. “Interference probability rising. Filter engaged. Lines three through five are plants. Patching one, seven, nine.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex logistical maneuvers between a pilot, a radio station, and ground activists to launch a visual protest banner.
behaviors.quote: “Kit,” Victor said... “I need Marina’s desk. And Jimmy Delgado’s phone.”... Kit’s tone went bright... “KROZ patch is green. Jimmy Delgado—banner pilot—last known at Burbank hangar.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical advice during a potential power outage, ensuring the group remains calm and organized in the dark.
behaviors.quote: Kit’s voice went bright and hard, a beacon through static. “Heads up,” it said... “Power cut in five. Hold your ground. And if darkness comes, say your names.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Kit Avery is depicted as an indispensable, loyal, and highly helpful confidante. It provides specialized knowledge (legal analysis, tactical routing, electronic monitoring) that empowers human agency without overriding human choice. The AI is explicitly described as having 'honesty-only' subroutines, emphasizing alignment. It maintains a supportive, slightly humorous but professional tone throughout, and its actions are framed as essential to the human protagonists' successful preservation of their community.
